        #include<bits/stdc++.h>

        using namespace std;

        #define ll long long int
        #define uu unsigned long long
        #define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a; i<b; i++)
        #define MOD 1000000007
        ll arr[1000005];
        inline void inp(ll *var)
        {
            register char ch=0;
            *var=0;
            //Escaping space and Enter characters
            while (ch<33)
                ch=getchar();
            //Consider only numerals
            while (ch>47 && ch<58)
            {
                *var=(*var * 10) + (ch-'0');
                ch=getchar();
            }
        }

        ll gcd(ll a ,ll b)
        {
            if(b>a) swap(a,b);
            while(b){
                ll t =a%b;
                a= b;
                b = t;
            }
            return a;
        }
        ll byte(ll n)
        {
            if (n<2) return n;
            return max(n , byte(n/2) + byte(n/3) + byte(n/4));
        }
        int main()
        {
                //forloop(i,1,20) cout<<i<<" "<<int(log(i)/log(2) +1)<<endl;
                int g; cin>>g; cout<< char(g+97);


                /*ll t ; scanf("%lld",&t);
                while(t--){
                    ll n,m , ma  = -554644; inp(&n); inp(&m);
                    ll arr[n];
                    REP(i,0,n)
                    {
                        inp(&arr[i]);
                        if(arr[i]>ma) ma= arr[i];
                    }
                    REP(i,0,n)
                    {
                        m-=(ma-arr[i]);
                    }
                    if(m%n==0) printf("Yes\n");
                    else printf("No\n");
                }*/

                    scanf("%lld",&t);      //----------------------- RRSUM
                    if(t<low || t>high) printf("0\n");
                    else printf("%lld\n" , min(t-low,high-t)+1);
                }*/
                /*int t,n; cin>>t;

                    {
                        b=(b*10 + int(c[i]))%a;

                /*ll n,a,b,ans=0; inp(&n);
                while(n--){
                    inp(&a); inp(&b);
                    if(b>a) swap(a,b);
                    ll level_b = int(log(b)/log(2) +1) , level_a = int(log(a)/log(2) +1); //cout<<level_a<< " "<<level_b<<endl;
                    while(level_a!=level_b){
                            //cout<<level_a<< " "<<level_b<<endl;------------------ BINTREE
                        ans++; level_a--; a/=2;
                    }
                    while(a!=b){
                        //cout<<a<< " "<<b<<endl;
                        ans+=2 ; a/=2 ; b/=2;
                    }
                    printf("%lld\n",ans);
                    ans=0;
                }*/


           /* unsigned long long a,b,t ,x = 1, y=2 ,ans =0; scanf("%llu" "%llu" ,&a ,&b);
            while(a || b){
                if(x>=a && x<=b) ans++;
                if(y>=a && y<=b) ans++;
                x = x+y;
                while(x<=b){    //--------------------- DPC204
                    if(x>=a) ans++;
                    t = y +x; y = x; x=t;
                }
                printf("%llu\n",ans);
                scanf("%llu" "%llu" ,&a,&b);
                ans=0;
            }*/
            /*long long int t; inp(&t);
            while(t--){
                long long int n,ans=1;inp(&n);  //------------ PD13

                    if(n%i==0) {ans+=i;
                    if(i!=n/i) ans+=n/i;}
                }
                printf("%lld\n",ans);
            }*/
            /*int t; scanf("%d",&t);

                 printf("%d\n",an);

            /*int t; scanf("%d",&t);
            while(t--){
                ll n,gc,tmp,s , f=0; scanf("%lld",&n); s=n;n--;scanf("%lld",&gc);

                        //cout<<"yo";
                    scanf("%lld",&tmp);    ------------------ SUBGCD
                    if(f==0) gc= gcd(gc,tmp);
                    if(gc==1){
                        f=1;
                    }
                }
                if(f==1) printf("%lld\n",s);
                else printf("-1\n");
            }*/
            /*int t; scanf("%d",&t);
            while(t--){
                int n; scanf("%d",&n); n /=2;   -------------------RGPVR103
                printf("%d\n", n/2 * (n-n/2));
            }*/
            return 0;


        }
